snippet: Keith Judd, who is serving a sentence of more than 17 years in Texas, won more than 40 percent of vote in the Democratic primary. President Obama won 57.27 percent.
abstract: Keith Judd, who is serving a sentence of more than 17 years in Texas, won more than 40 percent of vote in the Democratic primary. President Obama won 57.27 percent.

headline.main: Federal Prisoner Fares Well in West Virginia's Democratic Primary
